description: Determine the appropriate category for a given rule based on the semantic fit between the rule's intent and the categories defined in internal/standards/rule_categorization.json.

input.description: The full text of a single rule to be categorized.

instructions.overview: Categorize the rule based on the scoring methodology, execution steps, tie-breaking rules, and fallback behavior defined in the standard.
instructions.reference_standard: Follow all logic as defined in internal/standards/rule_categorization.json.

output.description: Return only the abbreviation (e.g., 'MEM', 'HAL', 'LEN') of the selected category.
